entry.title: ShedCode
entry.content:
James Jefferies

ShedCode’s director is James Jefferies. He formed ShedCode in the summer of 2011 to work on interesting projects with interesting people.

Past Projects

James has worked on

  • Happenstance Project (Digital R&D fund)
  • Application forms for the Co-operative Bank
  • Recruitement system for South Yorkshire Police
  • Platform for Technology Strategy Board, _connect
  • Meter reading systems for RWE/Yorkshire Electricity/npower

Tech

Experience of working with the Java platform, mainly web applications. Currently picking up Rails & Grails with iOS later on in the year.
